subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramirez, returning from a 50-game suspension for violating baseball’s drug policy, went 0 for 3 and provided little help in the Dodgers’ 6-3 win over the Padres.
snippet: Manny Ramirez, returning from a 50-game suspension for violating baseball’s drug policy, went 0 for 3 and provided little help in the Dodgers’ 6-3 win over the Padres.
